St. Croix stoplight parrotfish National Coral Reef Monitoring Program observed (open circles) and predicted (blue line) indices of relative abundance and associated standard errors by modeling scenario. Lines indicate 95% uncertainty interval around observed index values based on the model assumption of lognormal error.
:::

::: {#fig-lenfit layout-ncol="2"}

![a_m3](/Scenarios/84_stx_f3_5cm_010641_0041_a_m3/plots/comp_lenfit__aggregated_across_time.png){width="65%"}

![b_m3](/Scenarios/84_stx_f3_5cm_010641_0041_b_m3/plots/comp_lenfit__aggregated_across_time.png){width="65%"}

![v1_m3](/Scenarios/84_stx_f3_5cm_010641_0041_v1_m3/plots/comp_lenfit__aggregated_across_time.png){width="65%"}

![v3_m3](/Scenarios/84_stx_f3_5cm_010641_0041_v3_m3/plots/comp_lenfit__aggregated_across_time.png){width="65%"}

![v7_m3](/Scenarios/84_stx_f3_5cm_010641_0041_v7_m3/plots/comp_lenfit__aggregated_across_time.png){width="65%"}

St. Croix stoplight parrotfish observed and predicted length distributions aggregated across years for the Commercial Dive and NCRMP length compositions by modeling scenario. Green lines represent predicted length compositions, while gray regions represent observed length compositions. The effective sample size used to weight the length composition data is provided by N adj (the input sample size), and N eff (the calculated effective sample size used in the McAllister-Ianelli tuning method), are shown in the upper right corners.
:::

::: {#fig-lenfit-ncrmp layout-ncol="2"}

![v7_m3](/Scenarios/84_stx_f3_5cm_010641_0041_v7_m3/plots/comp_lenfit_flt2mkt0.png){width="107%"}

St. Croix stoplight parrotfish observed and predicted length distributions for the NCRMP length composition data by year and modeling scenario. Green lines represent predicted length compositions, while gray regions represent observed length compositions. The effective sample size used to weight the length composition data is provided by N adj (the input sample size), and N eff (the calculated effective sample size used in the McAllister-Ianelli tuning method), are shown in the upper right corners.
:::

::: {#fig-retro layout-ncol="2"}

![a_m3](/Scenarios/84_stx_f3_5cm_010641_0041_a_m3/diagnostics/retro/plots/retro_SSB.png){width="65%"}

![b_m3](/Scenarios/84_stx_f3_5cm_010641_0041_b_m3/diagnostics/retro/plots/retro_SSB.png){width="65%"}

![v1_m3](/Scenarios/84_stx_f3_5cm_010641_0041_v1_m3/diagnostics/retro/plots/retro_SSB.png){width="65%"}

![v3_m3](/Scenarios/84_stx_f3_5cm_010641_0041_v3_m3/diagnostics/retro/plots/retro_SSB.png){width="65%"}

![v7_m3](/Scenarios/84_stx_f3_5cm_010641_0041_v7_m3/diagnostics/retro/plots/retro_SSB.png){width="65%"}


St. Croix stoplight parrotfish retrospective analysis of spawning stock biomass (SSB) conducted by refitting models after removing five years of observation, one year at a time sequentially. Mohn's rho statistics and the corresponding "hindcast rho" measure the severity of retrospective patterns. One-year-ahead projections denoted by color-coded dashed lines with terminal points. Grey shaded areas are the 95% confidence intervals.
:::
